feed.title: [ANNOUNCE] picocoin and libccoin -- C-based bitcoin library and client

entry.title: [ANNOUNCE] picocoin and libccoin -- C-based bitcoin library and client
entry.summary: The user is interested in checking out libccoin and picocoin on Windows. According to a response, both should work on the platform, but picocoin may be less secure due to the lack of fork. The response also suggests that Windows has good sandboxing support, and that the same feature could potentially be implemented using Win32.
